description: This CSS file contains styles and CSS variables for theme management in a React application, specifically managing light and dark themes with responsive design elements.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application class styling, includes properties for alignment, background color, and text color.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo, including size and pointer interactions.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styling for the app, focused on layout, size, and color.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link styling within the application, including color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, includes positioning, colors, and hover effects.
